articles.title: Tigers' Boo-Boos Give Twins Remarkably Dumb Walk-Off Win - Defector
articles.description: The Detroit Tigers found a novel way to blow a game Tuesday night in Minnesota.
articles.content: The Detroit Tigers found a novel way to blow a game Tuesday night in Minnesota. Nursing a 4-3 lead in the bottom of the ninth inning, Gregory Soto walked Trevor Larnach and Gio Urshela on eight pitch… [+1797 chars]
